Title: Relates to creating an appeals process for the district attorney
Summary: Relates to creating an appeals process for the district attorney in the county where the crime was committed where family members of a victim or persons residing in a county where an offender committed a crime can appeal the board's decision to release the offender if the offender committed certain criminal offenses.
LawCode: Amd ยง700, County L; amd ยง259-c, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law and the executive law, in relation to creating an appeals process for the district attorney
